channel.title: How do i make my client work with my source anyone?
channel.description:
I Download a source called Ancient Rush but no client download came with this source. someone told me to download hybrid v3 client so thats what i did.
now how do i make them both work?

item.title: How do i make my client work with my source anyone?
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

You need to change the connect ip in the client to your servers ip, or the default for localhost. Because chances are, right now you have your client connecting to the server it was made for. Instead of your own.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my client work with my source anyone?
